name: radiance (superposed)
description:
We were once a great nation, united under one flag, we travelled the stars and explored new frontiers.

However, all this peace was interrupted when the Arkhon had invaded. They were much stronger than us.

And in 21██, our kind was enslaved and suppressed by our lords. They quickly built factories to produce advanced technology, powered by energy that our people couldn't even grasp the concept of. 

But then, big, but decentralised group of rebels formed, with the wish of restoring our might.

But no matter how much they tried, they weren't able to resist. 

And here you are laying in a pile of trash. Lost, confused, but don’t worry. You will find a way, and you will help me, and in exchange...
